abstract.p: Web site of Monterey Bay Aquarium in California lists species that are overfished or endangered or whose production or harvesting damages the environment (S)

block.p: Copper River salmon from Alaska, in season for another two weeks, is one of 15 kinds of seafood on the ''best choices'' list on the Web site of the Monterey Bay Aquarium in California.

The aquarium's lists (at www.montereybayaquarium.org) steer conscientious diners away from species that are overfished, downright endangered or damaging to the environment. They can be printed out to make a portable guide. Bluefin tuna, Chilean sea bass, Atlantic cod, swordfish, orange roughy and American lobster are all on the ''lay off'' list. Farmed salmon is also included, because the aquarium says farming methods pollute neighboring waters.
